body: As you can see Honeybee can't find the RADIANCE on your system. Do you have RADIANCE installed? You need to download and install RADIANCE to be able to run daylighting analysis. Check the release notes for more information: [http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/release-not...](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/release-notes-honeybee-0-0-50-ladybug-0-0-54)
